translations: 常青藤；用于类似的攀缘植物的名称中

phrs.translation: 长春藤联盟；长春藤名牌大学
毒葛；接触毒漆引起的皮疹

sentences.sentence: The ivies trail over the walls.
Star professors at many universities, including the Ivies, never go near undergrads.
sentences.translation: 许多大学的大牌教授（其中也包括“常春藤联盟”的）从来不与本科生近距离接触。

sentences.sentence: All Ivies saw record applications this year (though Cornell hasn't released its final tally).
sentences.translation: 今年，常青藤盟校里每所学校的申请人数都创下新高(虽然康奈尔大学还未公布其最终数据)。
